titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the Cathedral-Church of Hereford on May the 29th, 1684 being the anniversary day of His late Majesties birth and happy restauration, at a feast then first instituted by some of the loyal inhabitants of that country / by Richard Bulkeley ...
titleStmt.author: Bulkeley, Richard, 1657 or 8-1702.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
